name: Sick Sick Solitaire
description:
Compo entry for Ludum Dare 33. Alas, I grew sick midway through the weekend, so had to submit what I had at the time, which is a completely un-themed, super hard type of solitaire where the black deck is your enemy but you have to use it to accomplish your goals all the same. It's fairly harsh. Instructions in the game. If you've ever played Four Seasons solitaire it's got a similar vibe.

Ludum Dare entry page is here
